title: Install issue: quantum-espresso+epw
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install quantum-espresso +epw %gcc@5.4.0 ^openmpi+pmi fabrics=verbs schedulers=slurm
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux mu07.pi.sjtu.edu.cn 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 22 16:42:41 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information

spec output:
```console
$ spack spec quantum-espresso +epw %gcc@5.4.0 ^openmpi+pmi fabrics=verbs
Input spec
--------------------------------
quantum-espresso%gcc@5.4.0+epw
    ^openmpi fabrics=verbs +pmi

Concretized
--------------------------------
quantum-espresso@6.3%gcc@5.4.0~elpa+epw hdf5=none +mpi~openmp patches=b776890d008e16cca28c31299c62f47de0ba606b900b17cbc27c041f45e564ca,bc8c5b8523156cee002d97dab42a5976dffae20605da485a427b902a236d7e6b +scalapack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
    ^fftw@3.3.8%gcc@5.4.0+double+float~fma+long_double+mpi~openmp~pfft_patches~quad simd=avx,avx2,sse2 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^openmpi@3.1.4%gcc@5.4.0~cuda+cxx_exceptions fabrics=verbs ~java~legacylaunchers~memchecker+pmi schedulers=auto ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^hwloc@1.11.11%gcc@5.4.0~cairo~cuda~gl+libxml2~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^libpciaccess@0.13.5%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^libtool@2.4.2%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^pkgconf@1.6.0%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^libxml2@2.9.8%gcc@5.4.0~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^libiconv@1.15%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@5.4.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^numactl@2.0.12%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^automake@1.13.4%gcc@5.4.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^m4@1.4.16%gcc@5.4.0 patches=c0a408fbffb7255fcc75e26bd8edab116fc81d216bfd18b473668b7739a4158e +sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
    ^netlib-scalapack@2.0.2%gcc@5.4.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo patches=22ebf4e3d5a6356cd6086ea65bfdf30f9d0a2038136127590cd269d15bdb03af,e8f30dd1f26e523dfb552f8d7b8ad26ac88fc0c8d72e3d4f9a9717a3383e0b33 ~pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^cmake@2.8.12.2%gcc@5.4.0~doc+ncurses+openssl~ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^openblas@0.3.5%gcc@5.4.0 cpu_target=auto ~ilp64+pic+shared threads=none ~virtual_machine arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```

The version without epw works fine.
```console
$ spack install quantum-espresso +epw %gcc@5.4.0 ^openmpi+pmi fabrics=verbs schedulers=slurm
```

The error log is below: 
```console
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' 'all' 'epw'

7 errors found in build log:
     5275    
     5276    gzip: ../archive/wannier90-2.1.0.tar.gz: not in gzip format
     5277    tar: This does not look like a tar archive
     5278    tar: Exiting with failure status due to previous errors
     5279    *** Unable to download http://www.wannier.org/code/wannier90-2.1.0.tar.gz.
     5280    *** Verify that the url is correct.
  >> 5281    make[4]: *** [uncompress-w90] Error 1
     5282    make[4]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpcwj/spack/var/spack/stage/quantum-espresso-6.3-cuuc5qjzzer2slen7s4d6vrapaw3
             7t26/q-e-qe-6.3/install'
  >> 5283    make[3]: *** [w90] Error 1
     5284    make[3]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpcwj/spack/var/spack/stage/quantum-espresso-6.3-cuuc5qjzzer2slen7s4d6vrapaw3
             7t26/q-e-qe-6.3'
  >> 5285    /bin/sh: line 0: cd: wannier90-2.1.0/: No such file or directory
     5286    make[3]: Entering directory `/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpcwj/spack/var/spack/stage/quantum-espresso-6.3-cuuc5qjzzer2slen7s4d6vrapaw
             37t26/q-e-qe-6.3'
  >> 5287    make[3]: *** No rule to make target `lib'.  Stop.
     5288    make[3]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpcwj/spack/var/spack/stage/quantum-espresso-6.3-cuuc5qjzzer2slen7s4d6vrapaw3
             7t26/q-e-qe-6.3'
  >> 5289    make[2]: *** [wannier] Error 2
     5290    make[2]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpcwj/spack/var/spack/stage/quantum-espresso-6.3-cuuc5qjzzer2slen7s4d6vrapaw3
             7t26/q-e-qe-6.3/EPW/src'
  >> 5291    make[1]: *** [epw] Error 2
     5292    make[1]: Leaving directory `/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpcwj/spack/var/spack/stage/quantum-espresso-6.3-cuuc5qjzzer2slen7s4d6vrapaw3
             7t26/q-e-qe-6.3/EPW'
  >> 5293    make: *** [epw] Error 1

```
